attachment.name: A 2U rackmount server with its top cover off. Various electronics are visible inside, and the front drive bays have two caddies and ten empty spaces.

content:
For a mere $500 on eBay I have acquired a Dell R730XD to replace my current Synology NAS with a TrueNAS install, plus to become a dev VM host.

28 cores across two Xeon processors, 128GB of ECC RAM (I really wanted ECC since we get more bit-flipping cosmic rays at altitude!) and 14 disk bays so I can add my existing ones plus room to spare. It is, uh, a significant power upgrade.
